_sText:
Hello guys, my nickname is vandyke. I started with mapping as cs 1.6 came out. All my maps were made in cs 1.6 version. this map is a remake from 1.6. 

Long time after mapping i did nothing for CS. This was a first try to convert the map to the new source engine. Now i feel like in old days. I am full of ideas and lust of mapping and now i am more experienced. I hope you'll have fun.

First of all it's a aim map, but you can also have a lot of fun with players at lans. There is 1 AWP and 2 SCOUTS in water (who will be first ?!). Hint: try also to get very high for the sniper place for another awp (look on the overview screenshot ;))

edit: created and added the map overview and the radar to  
the map.

video of the map:
